Articles.Content:
First post on the forum, so here goes!

I recently saw HarvestR's dev blog about creating flags for kerbals.

Does anybody know what is (possibly?) planned for the 0.20 update? The flags would be amazing, but surely the devs would include more than one thing in a patch... right?

As far as I know, nothing has been confirmed for 0.20 yet. I am aware that the following features are currently being worked on (not sure which update for):

-Clouds (long time away)

-Resource mining/gathering/processing

-New parts

-New aerodynamic effects

-Flag planting

-New patcher

Anyone is free to update/correct the list above.

Cool thanks deadshot462. I've also been wondering what's currently under development.

Really can't wait until resources are out.
Please oh please find a new way to load all the parts when the game starts. I'd give up every other new feature for that one thing.

Please oh please find a new way to load all the parts when the game starts. I'd give up every other new feature for that one thing.

I totally agree
Buy a computer with a solid state drive and it will be super fast!
Harvester just posted about a map filtering system. It looks like it will clean up the tracking station (and maybe the map view) by a lot.

As far as I know, nothing has been confirmed for 0.20 yet. I am aware that the following features are currently being worked on (not sure which update for):

-Clouds (long time away)

-Resource mining/gathering/processing

-New parts

-New aerodynamic effects

-Flag planting

-New patcher

Anyone is free to update/correct the list above.

What? new aerodynamic effects? Didn't we just get them?

What? new aerodynamic effects? Didn't we just get them?

I think he means things like wingtip contrails, and who knows, maybe even wind effects!

Also, why are clouds a long way away? I'd even settle for just a simple .jpg layer over the planets when in orbit, just as a proof of concept.
The only thing I think that is definitely confirmed for .20 is fuel resource mining and processing.

I think he means things like wingtip contrails, and who knows, maybe even wind effects!

Also, why are clouds a long way away? I'd even settle for just a simple .jpg layer over the planets when in orbit, just as a proof of concept.

Probably talking about the reworked aerodynamics model that will make nosecones on fuel tanks actually reduce drag instead of increasing it.

Buy a computer with a solid state drive and it will be super fast!

I do have a solid state drive...

I really really REALLY want cloud effects sooner or later and maybe a improved look for atmospheres while in orbit. Because all of the planets are 10x smaller than real life, and the fact that there are no clouds or weather really detracts from the beauty of being in orbit

Kerbin always looks ******* beautiful from orbit to me, and clouds in my opinion would ruin it though just a few clouds here and there I could live with, but if flags aren't in the next update, I might just die...
Does anyone know when this next update is going to be coming out (about) because its been over a month and id love some new stuff to do in stock version
I hope for couple of new parts: proper rover seats, animated cargo bay, fairings. And some sort of connector plate allowing for clustering engines without fiddling with cubic trusses.

animated cargo bay

animated cargo bay

animated cargo bay

animated cargo bay

animated cargo bay

animated cargo bay

animated cargo bay

Please please please this. There's literally no use for the Mk3 fuselages right now unless you download mods..Mk2 are at least useful in being lighter and less drag than the standard 1.25m jet fuel canister (why?) but Mk3 has no real utility unless you download C7 Aerospace or FatNose (which is actually a Mk4 size) or things of that nature. Would really like to see some expansion done with plane/shuttle things such as crew fuselages and of course cargo bays.

I do have a solid state drive...

And it's CPU limited anyway, SSD or spinny doesn't make any real difference. I seriously don't find the load time an issue. Start the game loading, go look at porn or something for the minute or two it takes and then go play.

And it's CPU limited anyway, SSD or spinny doesn't make any real difference. I seriously don't find the load time an issue. Start the game loading, go look at porn or something for the minute or two it takes and then go play.

I've never compared the two, even on SSD the load times aren't what I'd call quick. Agreed, it's a real benefit being able to minimise and do other things for a couple of minutes

I totally agree

How the fishing going guys? One had a few bites I see.

Kerbin always looks ******* beautiful from orbit to me, and clouds in my opinion would ruin it though just a few clouds here and there I could live with, but if flags aren't in the next update, I might just die...

Clouds would ruin it...?

..Go home pango, youre drunk.
http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Planned_features

Clouds would ruin it...?

..Go home pango, youre drunk.

It could only be ruined if there are too many clouds everywhere. I don't want a planet made out of clouds.

Didn't they say there's been too much focus on advanced features like resource mining lately in development and they're shifting instead to focus on career mode?

Improved tracking station and flag sound very much like features targeting career mode to me. I highly doubt mining will be in 0.20

It could only be ruined if there are too many clouds everywhere. I don't want a planet made out of clouds.

Unless, you know, there is another planet, that is really just one big ball of cloud.
